mapper.insert: insert into sys_operation_log(title, business_type, class_method, request_method, operator_type, operation_name, operation_url, operation_ip, operation_location, operation_param, json_result, operation_status, error_msg, operation_time, createTime) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{classMethod}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{operationName}, #{operationUrl}, #{operationIp}, #{operationLocation}, #{operationParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{operationStatus}, #{errorMsg}, #{operationTime}, sysdate())
